meanings.sent1: Wearing those sunglasses really trendifies your outfit.
meanings.sent2: She trendifies her wardrobe by adding colorful accessories.
meanings.sent3: The cat trendifies the room by sitting on the latest fashion magazines.
meanings.sent4: His new haircut trendifies his appearance, making him stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent5: Adding a pop of color trendifies the room instantly.

meanings.definition: Trendifies (third person singular present) - makes trendy or fashionable.
meanings.sent1: Every season, the designer trendifies the runway with new styles.
meanings.sent2: He trendifies his Instagram feed with stylish photos.
meanings.sent3: The dog trendifies the park by wearing a tiny bowtie.
meanings.sent4: Her smile trendifies her face, lighting up the room.
meanings.sent5: The artist trendifies the canvas with bold strokes of color.
